incident_updates.body:
We will be performing maintenance in the fr-3.platform.sh region to release the latest features, bug fixes, and performance updates.

All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.

If you have any questions about this maintenance, please contact Platform.sh Support by logging in to https://console.platform.sh/ and visiting the Support Center.  You can also access our public chat channel using https://chat.platform.sh.

Sincerely,
Platform.sh Support Team

Platform.sh will become Upsun on September 23rd, 2025.  
To facilitate this change, we will be undertaking maintenance on our Accounts services. 
During this maintenance window, you can expect a brief interruption ( < 10 mins ) to Console, API, Deployments, Provisioning, Billing and Authentication services. 
Your project environments will not be affected by this transition and will not experience any downtime. 

You can read more about the changes here: https://upsun.com/platform-sh-is-now-upsun/

Please contact us via our support channels with any questions or concerns.
